name: Top Duck
description:
Description:

Collect more bread than those evil geese in 90 seconds and you are crowned The Top Duck. There have been stirrings about one goose in particular that goes by the name Cowboy Goose. He has been a menace to all of duck kind ever since the council of geese unleashed him upon the land. Do be weary of him you brave, brave duck; for if you fail, the geese shall bring destruction to all of duck kind.

Do you have what it takes?

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys for movement

Left Click while looking at an enemy to Honk at them 

Geese can not handle the honk of a potential Top Duck and will be stunned.

For every five bread you get an additional honk

Created by Funny Chicken Games in our first game jam

I would like to apologize for the file size, we are new to unreal and we had problems with packaging the project.

Enjoy!
